Author: sbucks#9217
Content: @Hermes  thanks, i claimed back on the 15th or so, was just wondering if i needed to claim again before block 1M or if i could wait til 15th of september.

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: With 2.41d you are good to go if you will like to claim on the 15 th ,

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: You can also claim again before the 15th  just make sure to claim at least more than .01 of rewards always .

Author: Tac#1954
Content: With the way interest work as long as we claim the rewards is that good enough or do you actually have to send our entire balance to a new receive address?

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: Claiming the reward is the only requirement , if you send the balance to a new receive address will also make the reward function work because it you have to spend the utxos in order to get the reward. So you can do it either way it won't change the reward.

Author: Tac#1954
Content: Thank you

Author: CrisF#3405
Content:

Search didn't turn anything up and I can't find `cli` in Agama.

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: (possilbe in SVP?)

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: sendmany "fromaccount" {"address":amount,...} ( minconf "comment" ["address",...] )

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: https://support.supernet.org/support/solutions/articles/29000013922-komodo-platform-command-line-on-windows

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: @Hermes  Thanks, Where can I find cli on Agama (SPV mode)?

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: You need to  use on native

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: Settings then selecting CLI

Author: Hermes#6934
Content: You can import the private e key into Native mode  and do it from there

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: Great, thank you very much!
